turns.speaker: SPEAKER_01
turns.text: I’ve been taking Lipitor for my cholesterol for the last 3 months.

turns.speaker: SPEAKER_00
turns.text: Have you noticed any side effects, like muscle pain or fatigue?

turns.speaker: SPEAKER_01
turns.text: Yes, some muscle aches, but I’m not sure if it’s from exercise.

turns.speaker: SPEAKER_01
turns.text: Yes, I get hives if I take Zyrtec.
